name: MKCoordinateSpan
desc: The width and height of a map region.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a coordinate span that represents a width and height on a map.

items.name: init(latitudeDelta: CLLocationDegrees, longitudeDelta: CLLocationDegrees)
items.desc: Creates a new MKCoordinateSpan from the specified values.

items.name: var latitudeDelta: CLLocationDegrees
items.desc: The amount of north-to-south distance (measured in degrees) to display on the map.

items.name: var longitudeDelta: CLLocationDegrees
items.desc: The amount of east-to-west distance (measured in degrees) to display for the map region.
